price: Gye sε wͻn a wͻagye adie na wͻdi dwuma pa no, na wͻde Nokorε no tu (amanfoͻ) foͻ, san de aboterε ne ntooboaseε no kasa kyerε (nnipa)
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti watawāṣaw bil-ḥaqi watawāṣaw bil-ṣabri
